title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 17.7 - Melloream shake: identity; label statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 17.7 - Melloream shake: identity; label statement

State Regulations
(a) Description. Melloream shake is a
pasteurized semi-viscous drink consisting of safe and suitable ingredients, including, but not limited to milk-derived nonfat solids and vegetable fat. It
may contain nutritive carbohydrate sweetners, flavoring ingredients and
harmless coloring. (1)
its content of fat
shall be not less than 3.25 percent; (2)
its contents of total milk solids shall
not be less than 11 percent; (3)
contain not less than 20 percent total solids; and
(4)
it is not produced by freezing while
stirring. (b) Nomenclature: label statement. The name of the food is "melloream
shake."
(c) Vitamin addition
optional. Vitamin D may be added to the product provided it be in such a
quantity that each quart of the food contains 400 international units thereof, within limits of good manufacturing practice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
17.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
